title: Praying 4 rakahs with 1 tasleem after isha is equivalent to Praying on laylatul qadr, authentic?
transcript: uh Shake I have heard one speaker saying that praying for raka after Aisha with one taslim is equivalent to praying them on Lilith I would like to know whether this is true or not and if yes how do we pray it this is an issue of dispute and the reason is is the Hadith valid or not is the Hadith authentic or not and the most uh reliable and authentic opinion is that this Hadith is not authentic to the prophet Allah and this is our methodology we're inclined to only follow the Quran and the hadiths of the Prophet Allah whatever he had done we follow it if there is another narration from a companion or from but it is not to the prophet Allah it's an issue of dispute among Scholars should we take it because the companions most likely did not bring it out of thin air or should we refrain and stick to what is authentic and proven from the sin of the Prophet salaam I am inclined to the latter therefore I do not believe that this Hadith is authentic and I do not believe that we should implement it or do it in Allah Knows Best
